sentences.en: A host of unrelated incidents drove him to this destructive view.
sentences.cn: 大量的孤立的事实使他产生了这样一种极其危险的看法.

sentences.en: Although not ideal, this attitude is not entirely destructive.
sentences.cn: 这种态度虽然不够理想，但还不至于消极透顶。
妄想有时也具有潜在的破坏性。

sentences.en: Drinkwise Day is mainly designed to educate people about the destructive effects of alcohol abuse.
sentences.cn: 设置“理智饮酒日”的主要目的是让人们了解酗酒的恶果。
负疚感会具有很强的杀伤力。

sentences.en: He had a reckless, self-destructive streak.
sentences.cn: 他生性鲁莽草率，会做出自毁行为。

sentences.en: He was unable to contain his own destructive feelings.
sentences.cn: 他无法抑制自己消极的情绪。

sentences.en: It is the most destructive storm in 20 years.
sentences.cn: 这是20年来破坏性最大的一次风暴.

sentences.en: It was the most destructive storm in 30 years.
sentences.cn: 那是三十年来毁灭性最大的风暴.

sentences.en: Severe damage witnessed the destructive force of the storm.
sentences.cn: 严重的损失表明了这场暴风雨巨大的破坏力.

sentences.en: Tanks are heavy on fuel and destructive to roads.
sentences.cn: 坦克要耗费大量的燃料，而且会破坏道路。

sentences.en: the destructive power of modern weapons
sentences.cn: 现代武器的毁灭性力量

sentences.en: There is at last an apparent end to the destructive price war.
sentences.cn: 这场惨烈的价格战貌似终于结束了。

sentences.en: Those anticancer drugs are effective, but also destructive to white blood cells.
sentences.cn: 那些抗癌药是有效的, 但也破坏白细胞.

sentences.en: Under cross-examination, he admitted the state troopers used more destructive ammunition than usual.
sentences.cn: 在反复盘问下，他承认该州警察使用了比平常更具破坏性的弹药。

words.tran_cn: 破坏性；毁灭性；破坏能力

phrases.tran_cn: 相消干涉，相消干扰；破坏性干扰

trans.tran_en: causing damage to people or things
